JobFullDesc: Facebook is seeking a Control Systems Engineer to join the Bay Area Facility Operations team. There has been rapid growth in our campuses and facilities throughout the Bay Area, and our facilities support an increasing amount of building systems, critical infrastructure, and laboratory operations.  The Control Systems Engineer will be the lead controls steward in Facilities Engineering, providing system architecture leadership, oversite of control system design during tenant improvements and other construction projects, and assist in fault detection and diagnosis in day-to-day operations for all Bay Area campuses.  The ideal candidate will be a technical expert in the controls industry, with the ability to provide technical solutions and guidance, and participate in regional and global standardization
